title: Brand spend on eSports sponsorship and advertising worldwide 2015 to 2020
summary: In general Spending in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, and lastly slightly increasing from 2017 to 2020.
The line significantly increased by 703.0 from Year 2017 to 2020.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2020.
The highest Spending in million U.S. dollars, of value 1220.0 was reached at Year 2020
The lowest Spending in million U.S. dollars, of value 350.0 was reported at Year 2016
